generator.title: Guitar Tab Generator
generator.subtitle: Create professional guitar tablatures with our interactive generator. Select frets on the instrument neck and export your tabs as PDF.

tutorial.title: Quick Start Guide
tutorial.step2: Click on frets below to add notes
tutorial.step3: Add new columns for more chords
tutorial.step4: Listen to your tab with the play button
